text: Janne "Loffe" Carlsson (12 March 1937 – 31 August 2017), sometimes credited as Janne Carlsson, Jan Carlsson or Janne Karlsson, was a Swedish movie and television actor. He was also a skilled drummer, featured on several albums in Swedish 1970s and 1980s music. He was born in Stockholm, Sweden. Carlsson was the 'Karlsson' of the Swedish jazz fusion/psychedelic rock duo Hansson & Karlsson that were active in the late 1960s. Carlsson was known for his roles in Blushing Charlie (1970), Exponerad (1971), Repmånad (1979) and in Göta kanal eller Vem drog ur proppen? (1981). Carlsson died on 31 August 2017 of liver cancer in Kristianstad, Sweden at the age of 80.Janne "Loffe" Carlsson är död ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Sweden Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish television actors Category:Swedish musicians Category:Rock drummers Category:Jazz musicians Category:Actors from Stockholm Category:Musicians from Stockholm
title: Janne Carlsson
